title: Falcon Linter Metadata
description: Configuration file for the Falcon Linter AI code reviewer.

projectInfo.description: Information about the project being reviewed.

language.description: The primary programming language of the project (e.g., TypeScript, Python, C#).

projectType.description: The type of project (e.g., microservice, web-app, cli, library).

framework.description: The primary framework used in the project (e.g., React, Node.js, FastAPI, .NET).

customPrompts.description: Custom instructions to append to the AI prompts.

ignoredExtensions.description: A list of file extensions (without the leading dot) to ignore during the review process (e.g., ["yml", "js", "map"]).
